Montebello.Ramona Convent Secondary School: Ramona Convent Secondary School is a private, Catholic, college preparatory school for girls grades 9-12, located in Alhambra, California. Established in 1889 by the Sisters of the Holy Names, Ramona is one of the oldest continually operating schools in the same location in California and has graduated over 8,300 students. Today, more than 5,600 alumnae located throughout the world serve their communities both professionally and personally.
